description:
A weekly podcast showing "Actual Play" of tabletop roleplaying games. Our group focuses on telling truly collaborative stories with a heavy amount of roleplaying. This is the podcast version of the live video show broadcast Wednesdays and Thursdays on our Twitch channel. 

Season 1 (1-135) is a complete Dungeons & Dragons campaign.
Season 2 (139 and ongoing) is a our next big long-term campaign. It is played as TWO weekly sessions, each with a different cast of players and characters. The two storylines are happening simultaneously at two different places in the same campaign world.
title: Thursday Knights Live Tabletop Roleplaying

episodes.title: Episode 135: Undone
episodes.description: The Quorum faces their final and most heart-wrenching trial before making their choice and facing the consequences in the thrilling conclusion of the Thursday Knights vs. 4e Saga. *Includes bonus talk at the end of the episode!

episodes.title: Episode 134: The Final Choice
episodes.description: In which Pazuzu’s plan begins to unravel, a choice is made, and a world’s fate hinges on what the heroes do next.

episodes.title: Episode 133: Pazuzu
episodes.description: After fighting their way to the core of the abyss, the heroes are faced with the architect behind the end of all things, and he is not going down without a fight.

episodes.title: Episode 132: Descent into Madness
episodes.description: The Quorum makes their final preparations for the perilous descent into the heart of the abyss – a place where nightmares are reality and where no sane soul can find peace.

episodes.title: Episode 131: Reign of Fire
episodes.description: Asmodeus proves a worthy foe easily capable of putting our heroes on the ropes if they fail to use their greatest (and potentially deadly) advantage.

episodes.title: Episode 130: Brimstone
episodes.description: With the fate of the world hanging on a thread the Lord of Hell standing in their way, the Quorum is forced to deal with what might be their most formidable foe yet.

episodes.title: Episode 129: The Darkening Dawn
episodes.description: The heroes return to a world on the brink of annihilation and find their situation has changed considerably from when they were first banished.

episodes.title: Episode 128: Exodus
episodes.description: The Quorum finally leaves behind the Dark World but returning to the world they know is no simple task, nor can they be fully prepared for what they find upon their return. One thing is for certain; the world they leave behind will be forever changed by the choices they’ve made.

episodes.title: Episode 127: Honor Bound
episodes.description: Mortals with god-like power against a true god appears to be a surprisingly even match, but while fate of the world hangs on a thread the heroes are given a chance to consider a more peaceful way to get what they want… with some strings attached.

episodes.title: Episode 126: Out of Luck
episodes.description: Though it may be true that fortune favors the brave, when the Quroum chooses to take on the Goddess of Luck herself the odds are most definitely not in their favor.

episodes.title: Episode 125: A Distant Call
episodes.description: The heroes receive a mysterious call for help, but when the messenger’s identity is revealed the Quorum is faced with a heart-wrenching decision.

episodes.title: Episode 124: Fallout
episodes.description: Decisions made in the dark of night are seen quite differently in the light of day… and one hero is pushed to the limit when the barest glimmer of truth is finally uncovered.

episodes.title: Episode 123: Such Sweet Sorrow
episodes.description: The heroes catch their first glimmer of hope, but as their plans are set into motion so too does Evil move against them with plans of its own.

episodes.title: Episode 122: The Enemy of My Enemy
episodes.description: The heroes learn that Doom Island is the least of their problems, but when the situation turns from dire to deadly, they may find themselves forced to accept the aid of a very unlikely ally.

episodes.title: Episode 121: Blood in the Water
episodes.description: Trapped under two-hundred feet of blood-tinged water the heroes confront one of their oldest and deadliest foes as the fate of The City hangs in the balance.

episodes.title: Episode 120: God Slayers
episodes.description: With yet another god’s power absorbed, the heroes turn back to The City, and are faced with the sudden realization that they may be in over their heads.

episodes.title: Episode 119: A Matter of Time
episodes.description: Still reeling from the effects of Shar’s demise, the heroes turn their attentions towards unraveling the mysterious realm of the Lord of the Continuum.

episodes.title: Episode 118: What Lies Beneath
episodes.description: The heroes come away from their encounter with Shar changed, but is it for the better?

episodes.title: Episode 117: The Knights of Thunderstrike
episodes.description: Eric stars as our special Guest DM for this special one-off edition of “The Knights of Thunderstrike” in which we meet our cast of unlikely heroes lovingly nicknamed “The Freak Squad”.

episodes.title: Episode 116: Scattering Shadows
episodes.description: The dead rise and the shadows gather as the Quorum takes on Shar, Goddess of Darkness.

episodes.title: Episode 115: Darkness
episodes.description: The Quorum of Thunderstrike prepares to face Shar while Wrenn puts his own personal agenda into motion. (Note: This Episode is cut short due to technical difficulties, and continues on in Episode 116: Scattering Shadows)

episodes.title: Episode 114: A Bleak Beginning
episodes.description: The heroes begin their quest for power at the source of darkness and shadow deep within the abyssal landscape. But while the promise of Shar’s power awaits them, so do the new denizens of this realm…

episodes.title: Episode 113: Hope
episodes.description: Many paths are put before the heroes and as they and The City get better acquainted with one another, A sudden realization gives them a tenuous spark of hope.

episodes.title: Episode 112: The City
episodes.description: Pazuzu’s successful ambush leaves the heroes stranded in the Dark World with no tether anchoring them to their own. Faced with the unending aberrant darkness and a maddening aura of despair, the Quorum fights to find anything familiar in this world. What they discover astonishes them.

episodes.title: Episode 111: What Have You Done
episodes.description: As the Quorum’s secret meeting with Keeper grows near they scramble to understand the path before them and find that the road ahead may be even darker than they’ve ever imagined.

episodes.title: Episode 110: Vengeance
episodes.description: The heroes plans are violently interrupted as they are drawn into a maelstrom that just may lead them exactly where they need to be… if they can handle the cost.

episodes.title: Episode 109: The Chronos Arrow
episodes.description: The Quorum finds the legendary Chronos Arrow just within reach as Hugh faces off against his other self, but can they obtain it before the ghosts of Hugh’s past tear them apart?

episodes.title: Episode 108: To Thine Own Self
episodes.description: Thrust once more into the Dark World, the heroes find a much darker and alien world awaits them. Tasked with the retrieval of the Chronos Arrow, they set out in this strange new world in search of the unique person who is rumored to possess it.

episodes.title: Episode 107: Swift Redsinger
episodes.description: The past comes back to haunt Hugh as the heroes investigate reports of a missing scout lost in the mysterious black fog settling over the swamp-covered ruins of Orva.

episodes.title: Episode 106: Where They Aren’t
episodes.description: With the bitter taste of defeat fresh on their lips the Quorum of Thunderstrike makes a vow to recover their lost ship and crew, no matter what may stand in their way.

episodes.title: Episode 105: The Devil and the Deep Blue Sea
episodes.description: Thunderstrike and its crew give their all in the increasingly desperate fight against the forces demon and shadow; only time will tell if it is enough.

episodes.title: Episode 104: From the Depths
episodes.description: Drawn by the mysterious tremors beneath the Golden Waters, the heroes of Thunderstrike investigate the source of the mystical arcane beacon, hoping to uncover the secrets it hides.

episodes.title: Episode 103: Sovereign
episodes.description: The heroes return to Ulgarth to aid Arora in an effort defeat the mysterious dark leader of Durpar’s army and end the war once and for all.

episodes.title: Episode 102: Worth
episodes.description: Wrenn’s trial by fire continues as he and his allies confront Caina’s infernal lord, while elsewhere in world another war is just reaching a fever pitch.

episodes.title: Episode 101: The War of Fire and Ice
episodes.description: The return to Thunderstrike lands the heroes in a critical moment of decision. With little time to spare, the Quorum of Thunderstrike heads towards the battlefront after gaining knowledge of deeper, more sinister plots moving against them.

episodes.title: Episode 100: The Hundredth Episode
episodes.description: The heroes face one of the toughest challenges yet when past, present and future collide in a world more twisted than any of them imagined possible.

episodes.title: Episode 99: The Croaker
episodes.description: The Quorum struggles to remain united as the truth revealed and desperation forces them into a ritual they will not soon forget.

episodes.title: Episode 98: Diplomacy
episodes.description: Thunderstrike hosts the diplomatic envoy from Estagund with hopes of gaining new military allies, but discover that the price may be further reaching than they first realized. Tensions rise, but when someone decides to solve the issue their own way, will Arora’s efforts be for naught before the ink is even dry?

episodes.title: Episode 97: Something Wicked
episodes.description: A scramble for the crimson stone rod leaves the heroes’ heads spinning as they are once again thrust into the present… and a diplomatic crisis. Meanwhile, the consequences of possessing the crimson stone rod begin rise to the surface.

episodes.title: Episode 96: Madness
episodes.description: The heroes are drawn deeper into their host’s deranged fantasy world while struggling to combat the dementia threatening to consume them.

episodes.title: Episode 95: A Walk in the Park
episodes.description: The expedition to retrieve the Crimson Stone Rod leads the heroes into the savage overgrowth of a country garden, which proves to be much more lethal than first expected. Undaunted, they press onward ever aware of the peculiar presence observing their progress…

episodes.title: Episode 94: An Empty Vessel
episodes.description: In which tables turn, treacherous deals are struck, and Brandis makes his choice.

episodes.title: Episode 93: Undying
episodes.description: Zahar and Brandis finally face off, but the Raven Queen has her own idea of what is a fair fight, and she has no intentions of allowing Brandis’ allies to help him.

episodes.title: Episode 92: The Duel
episodes.description: Arora leads the heroes to Ulgarth with good intentions, but quickly realizes there’s no such thing as a “quick fix” when it comes to politics. Meanwhile, the call of the Raven Queen continues to beckon Brandis to the shadowy land of Letherna where an unknown fate awaits.

episodes.title: Episode 91: This Means War
episodes.description: Tension runs ever higher as the heroes face several equally urgent decisions. One thing seems clear, however; whichever path they take will result in serious repercussions… some of which threaten to pit the heroes against each-other and tear them apart from within before they have a chance to face their enemies.

episodes.title: Episode 90: Bazim-Gorag
episodes.description: The heroes use their time to choose the most strategical plan to take down the Slaad Lord, knowing that the fate of the Valdai depends on their success, but even the best laid plans can fall prey to the unexpected…

episodes.title: Episode 89: Pandemonium
episodes.description: Spurred on by Deomin’s drive to rescue his people, the heroes of Thunderstrike take on the perils of the Pandemonium Stone before it vanishes beyond their reach.

episodes.title: Episode 88: The Valdai
episodes.description: The heroes leave Wheloon (And Hugh’s past) behind, and turn their attentions towards the fate of Deomin’s people in the elemental chaos. But are they truly ready for what’s waiting on the path they’ve chosen?

episodes.title: Episode 87: Arrows in the Dark
episodes.description: Getting into Wheloon was the easy part, but when Hugh’s “homecoming” threatens to become than just a walk down memory lane the heroes must fight to uncover just what it is that Legs has been keeping from them before its too late.

episodes.title: Episode 86: A Favor for Legs
episodes.description: The heroes return to Thunderstrike and find a multitude of problems and issues demanding their attention, each seemingly more urgent than the last. A research trip to Cormyr leads to the unexpected reappearance of someone one of the heroes would rather stayed buried in the past.

episodes.title: Episode 85: The Oracle
episodes.description: Our heroes valiantly fight their way to the oracle, but the price he demands forces one hero to give up something quite unexpected.

episodes.title: Episode 84: The Crystal Flame Caverns
episodes.description: The Quorum jumps back to the “Dark world”, but not before laying some plans of their own. They seek out their fortune and meet up with a familiar wanderer who guides them to what is left of civilization… but it’s hardly the sort of civilization they were expecting.

episodes.title: Episode 83: A Devilish Plan
episodes.description: The Quorum of Thunderstrike seeks the truth in Zuggtmoy’s hidden chamber, but find that with every question answered, the mystery only deepens further. Meanwhile, Wrenn’s choices begin to bear unexpected world-changing consequences.

episodes.title: Episode 82: Unraveled
episodes.description: The party faces down the Demon Queen of Rot only to find that the mystery winds deeper than they first suspected, as the strange voice within the orb soon reveals much more has been going on beyond the cult’s doors.

episodes.title: Episode 81: The Black Fountain
episodes.description: Having penetrated the outer defense of the temple, our heroes face a puzzling obstacle and a blast from the past.

episodes.title: Episode 80: Meet the Artifact Recovery Squad
episodes.description: First-time guest DM Lincoln takes charge and leads a group of adventurers into the mysterious Purple Desert in search of untold riches and glory. But when things go from puzzling to deadly, what will become of a lecherous eladrin, a pickled dwarf, a dark paladin dragonborn, and a dwarf with his eye on the prize?

episodes.title: Episode 79: Blood and Snow
episodes.description: The Quorum of Thunderstrike continue their trek through the frozen wasteland and find themselves in the company of unexpected allies. Together they plan an assault that the Temple of Elemental Evil won’t soon forget.

episodes.title: Episode 78: A Cold Reception
episodes.description: The party returns to Hommlet in hopes of decoding the mystery of the omens. What they find is a town teetering on the edge of chaos, and their plan to repair the damage is only a snag away from completely unraveling at their feet.

episodes.title: Episode 77: All that is Left
episodes.description: As our heroes struggle to resist the unending onslaught of enemies aboard Thunderstrike they realize that Stoyla’s new defense systems are more useful than they first appeared. But is it too little, too late?

episodes.title: Episode 76: Lockdown
episodes.description: When the ship’s portal jump drive breaks down suspicions of sabotage run rampant. Someone now has the Thunderstrike right where they want them, but who… and why?

episodes.title: Episode 75: Buried in the Past
episodes.description: As more of the dreamer’s world is uncovered, our heroes are suddenly faced with the dilemma of finding and exit in this dreamworld and waking the only one who has the key.

episodes.title: Episode 74: The Mind of Victor Blackwood
episodes.description: The heroes’ mysterious new informant offers them an opportunity to unlock the secrets of his nightly visions. But when Victor’s dreamworld turns out to be more dangerous than they’d first imagined, they find it may be their own minds which will turn on them in the end.

episodes.title: Episode 73: Defying Judgement
episodes.description: Judgement from divine sources have deemed that the party is guilty of an unforgivable crime, now the heroes must fight to survive the sentence.

episodes.title: Episode 72: More Than Meets the Eye
episodes.description: The heroes’ investigation turns up a new lead, but just before they’re finally able to get some answers a new sort of trouble comes to call.

episodes.title: Episode 71: The White Keep
episodes.description: Our heroes meet a mysterious angel and his strange ward, and discover no one is safe from the turmoil the cataclysm has created.

episodes.title: Episode 70: In the Land of the Wandering Sun
episodes.description: Hurtled into a parched wasteland, our heroes find themselves in a place where nothing is as it should be. Worse still, there seems to be either no way home, or no home to go back to. And all the while the mystery remains… where are they?

episodes.title: Episode 69: The End of All Things
episodes.description: Here begins the Epic Tier Campaign: The End of All Things A lost companion returns with a mysterious warning. Curiosity piqued, our heroes seek to learn more…

episodes.title: Episode 68: The Last Stand
episodes.description: The heroes pursue a bloodied and beaten Arath to his hiding place in the Arcane Academy, where he proves just what desperation can drive a man to do.

episodes.title: Episode 67: Battle of the Broken Soul, Part II
episodes.description: Part 2 of the epic final battle in which our heroes face danger and death, risking everything to stop the man who was once their ally from destroying everything. Those closest to the heroes offer their aid, but if the heroes choose to take it, who knows what the final toll may be?

episodes.title: Episode 66: Battle of the Broken Soul, Part I
episodes.description: Our Heroes make their stand against Arath and his forces. But are they prepared to face their long-lost friend at last?

episodes.title: Episode 65: Buying Time
episodes.description: Five unique individuals make this special episode their moment to shine. Listen in as they pave the way for our heroes in a feat of story telling that won’t soon be forgotten! Featuring “DM Eric”!

episodes.title: Episode 64: The Calm Before the Storm
episodes.description: As an epic confrontation looms on the horizon, our heroes make a last ditch effort to prepare themselves and their allies for what is to come.

episodes.title: Episode 63: Deal with the Devil
episodes.description: Our heroes learn that not every confrontation can end in victory, and not every consequence can be avoided when the past catches up with one of them in a very big way.

episodes.title: Episode 62: A Cure for Chaos
episodes.description: The chaotic elemental forces of the Shadow face off against our heroes, who quickly discover that the war is just beginning. What they have yet to realize is that victory will require someone to make the ultimate sacrifice.

episodes.title: Episode 61: An Oath, a Promise
episodes.description: With their final dedication to the primordial Queen of Air, our heroes are prepared to face whatever villainy holds their friend hostage… or are they?

episodes.title: Episode 60: A Life for a Life
episodes.description: The heroes are given a chance to regain what they’ve lost when a mysterious stranger appears just in time, but the price for this aid takes them by surprise.

episodes.title: Episode 59: For the Fallen
episodes.description: The search for a source of draconic magic leads our heroes into dire straits.

episodes.title: Episode 58: Awakening
episodes.description: Our heroes’ adventure takes an unusual turn at the feet of the beastly hydra.

episodes.title: Episode 57: Thunderhammer
episodes.description: The crew of the Thunderstrike meets their match while our heroes are away in chronological limbo.

episodes.title: Episode 56: A Race Against Time
episodes.description: Time quickly becomes a precious commodity as our heroes face the daunting task of finding where Arath will strike and saving Kalla’s fading spirit before it’s too late.

episodes.title: Episode 55: Saving Deep Imaskar
episodes.description: Our heroes’ dedication is put to the test as they struggle to balance justice, peace, and the ever-present threat of Arath’s machinations.

episodes.title: Episode 54: The Order of Blue Fire
episodes.description: The investigation comes to a head as our heroes follow the clues to their inevitable and potentially lethal conclusion.

episodes.title: Episode 53: The Truth
episodes.description: An interrogation leads to disturbing new revelations regarding events in Deep Imaskar.

episodes.title: Episode 52: Bad to Worse
episodes.description: Deep in the dangerous plaguelands, our heroes find themselves in the middle of an ambush!

episodes.title: Episode 51: Rumbling from Below
episodes.description: Episode 51 of the Thursday Knights Actual Play podcast is now available! Our heroes venture deep in to the treacherous plaguelands to find and confront an elusive order of spellscarred individuals.

episodes.title: Episode 50: Into the Plaguelands
episodes.description: Episode 50 of the Thursday Knights Actual Play podcast is now available! The information gathered from the assassins in the glade lead our heroes to seek guidance from the Order of the Blue Fire.

episodes.title: Episode 49: Spellfire
episodes.description: Episode 49 of the Thursday Knights Actual Play podcast is now available! While investigating the crime scene in Deep Imaskar, our heroes came under attack by a group of assassins! This episode starts in the middle of the fight.

episodes.title: Episode 48: The Investigation Begins
episodes.description: Episode 48 of the Thursday Knights Actual Play podcast is now available! Our heroes have been assigned the task of investigating the murder of the would-be king of Deep Imaskar.

episodes.title: Episode 47: In The City of the Great Seal
episodes.description: Episode 47 of the Thursday Knights Actual Play podcast is now available! With the Mind Flayer defeated, our heroes rush to Deep Imaskar to seek help for their fallen friend.

episodes.title: Episode 46: The Mindflayer
episodes.description: Episode 46 of the Thursday Knights Actual Play podcast is now available! Our heroes battle a Mindflayer and its thralls. Have they bit off more than they can chew?

episodes.title: Episode 45: The Dark Way Forward
episodes.description: Episode 45 of the Thursday Knights Actual Play podcast is now available! Having finally escaped from the past, our heroes find themselves with no time to spare. Deep Imaskar awaits.

episodes.title: Episode 44: Szass Tam
episodes.description: Episode 44 of the Thursday Knights Actual Play podcast is now available! The assault on the keep has begun. Trapped in unfamiliar bodies, our heroes prepare for their imminent confrontation with Szass Tam.

episodes.title: Episode 43: Memories of Blood and Death
episodes.description: Episode 43 of the Thursday Knights Actual Play podcast is now available! While Brandis desperately struggles to remember the details of this memory, our heroes make plans to defend the keep from the upcoming assault.

episodes.title: Episode 42: Marc Maddock
episodes.description: Episode 42 of the Thursday Knights Actual Play podcast is now available! Trapped in the past in unfamiliar bodies, our heroes desperately try to figure out what is going on.

episodes.title: Episode 41: The Planar Observatory
episodes.description: Episode 41 of the Thursday Knights Actual Play podcast is now available! Our heroes have finally located the mythical Planar Observatory, but have mere minutes to discover its secrets. Timeline Timeline coming soon.

episodes.title: Episode 40: The Final Defense
episodes.description: Episode 40 of the Thursday Knights Actual Play podcast is now available! Our heroes have only an hour before an army arrives at the vault. Will they find the information they need in time? Timeline Timeline coming soon.

episodes.title: Episode 39: Abandoned but not Empty
episodes.description: Episode 39 of the Thursday Knights Actual Play podcast is now available! As our heroes explore more of the mysterious vault, they find that they are not alone. Timeline Timeline coming soon.

episodes.title: Episode 38: Descent into the Vault
episodes.description: Episode 38 of the Thursday Knights Actual Play podcast is now available! Our heroes descend in to the depths of the vault. Will they finally find the Planar Observatory within? Timeline Timeline coming soon.

episodes.title: Episode 37: Earthquake
episodes.description: Episode 37 of the Thursday Knights Actual Play podcast is now available! Our heroes fight their way through the insane Derros to reach the Earth Node. Could it be the final piece of the puzzle to find the mythical Planar Observatory? Timeline Timeline coming soon.

episodes.description: Episode 36 of the Thursday Knights Actual Play podcast is now available! With the Underdark finally behind them, our heroes head back to Ulgarth to continue what they started so many months ago. Timeline Timeline coming soon.

episodes.description: Episode 35 of the Thursday Knights Actual Play podcast is now available! With victory in the Uchehi-Kai all but secured, our heroes now stand face-to-face with the Champion in Red. Timeline Timeline coming soon.

episodes.title: Episode 32: Uchehi-Kai

But how will the Shadar-Kai react to outsiders participating in their prestigious tournament? Timeline Timeline coming soon.

episodes.description: Episode 31 of the Thursday Knights Actual Play podcast is now available! In order to compete in the Uchehi-Kai, the heroes must prove themselves to the Shadar-Kai. Timeline Timeline coming soon.

episodes.description: Episode 29 of the Thursday Knights Actual Play podcast is now available! Our heroes go on a few side-adventures to prepare for the upcoming tournament in Ikemmu. Timeline Timeline coming soon.

episodes.title: Episode 27: A Night of Levity

episodes.title: Episode 26: Welcome to Neverwinter
episodes.description: Episode 26 of the Thursday Knights Actual Play podcast is now available! Our heroes make their way to Neverwinter, in search of the Prince of Ulgarth. Timeline Timeline coming soon.

episodes.description: Episode 25 of the Thursday Knights Actual Play podcast is now available! Our heroes swore revenge on Company Yargo after their last encounter. In this week’s episode, vengeance is theirs. Timeline Timeline coming soon.

episodes.description: Episode 21 of the Thursday Knights Actual Play podcast is now available! Even our mighty heroes cannot stay hidden forever. A character from Arora’s past has tracked the party down and asked them to surrender. Timeline Timeline coming soon.

episodes.description: Episode 20 of the Thursday Knights Actual Play podcast is now available! Not even gold can buy all information. The players must complete a task for the Gypsy Queen before she will give them what they seek. Timeline Timeline coming soon.

episodes.description: Episode 19 of the Thursday Knights Actual Play podcast is now available! The party has made their way to the capitol of Ulgarth, but they find little time to enjoy the sights; instead finding themselves the primary players in a manhunt that spans the entire city. episodes.description: Episode 18 of the Thursday Knights Actual Play podcast is now available! Having ensured the Philosopher’s Temple’s safety, the party turns their attention towards the desert lands of Ulgarth. Timeline Timeline coming soon.
